days.text: Dry. Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Light rain at night. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Light rain later. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
